name: Hellish Silence
description:
"Ah, another poor soul finds themselves trapped in this cursed library... No doubt lured by tales of great treasures and lost knowledge, just like the others. You'll find nought here but rot, death, and dusty tomes written in dead languages...

Move quietly, adventurer... The creatures hunting you have no need for sight in these dark hallways, but they will pounce upon even the merest whisper.

 Find the wizard's tomes, return them to where they each belong and perhaps you may see sunlight again, though you would be the first..."

Hellish Silence was developed for the 2021 RNDGAME Jam II 

Artwork - Kjetil Oestevik

Programming - Brian Duffy

Audio - Matt J Hart
